file_content.text: Goodbye.
Wow. You're really good.
You're not the first to notice.
That's what they tell me.
I thought for sure I had enough droids to kill you. I'm so embarrassed.
Risha'll never let me hear the end of this.
Can't believe this was a trap.
The guy who sold me those droids said they were top of the line. I want a refund.
And you're really dead.
Let's just call this even. With my ray shield on, you can't hurt me.
Feylara, how are you powering that ray shield?
Portable battery pack.
You know those only last a few minutes, right?
Oh, no....
Guess your three minutes are up.
Hah!
Aw, did the instructions have too many big words?
It's funny, and sad.
I need to put you out of my misery.
You're too dumb to live.
Honeybunch, my shield is down! What am I gonna do?
I don't know... die? Kill you later, Captain.
Honeybunch, wait! He--he hung up! I thought he loved me!
Skavak doesn't love anybody.
You were wrong.
My friends all said he was after my money, but they didn't know how he made me feel!
Go ahead and cry, if it makes you feel better.
I'm sorry for you.
I'm sorry I tried to kill you. Do you forgive me?
Let me out of here and go find yourself a new man.
Sure, why not?
I unsealed all the hatches so you can go. I'm sorry about everything.
I'm very forgiving when credits are involved.
I will if you pay me to.
Not even a little.
No. [Kill her]
If you want to live, pay me.
You can have my credits. They won't buy what I really want.
No sense letting all that wealth go to waste.
They'll buy what I want.
I'll let you get back to your crying.
Catch you later.
I unsealed all the hatches. Here, take the credits. Just leave me alone.
You're gullible to the bitter end, aren't you?
Sucker. [Kill her]
You were annoying enough before all the crying.
I'm bored now. [Kill her]
I should go. [Leave her]
Sure, go! Just like he did. I won't stop you. The hatches are unsealed.
Nobody loves you.
Idiot. [Kill her]
Ahh!
Was she a worthy enemy?
What did you do that for? She wasn't even armed.
Honeybunch....
Hi there. Was starting to think you wouldn't show.
We'll have this ship of yours fixed in no time.
Let's get to work.
I might have exaggerated a teensy bit about the damage.
How could I let down a fellow spacer?
I'd never leave you hanging.
Why'd you have to be pretty and nice? Why couldn't you have been mean and ugly?
I'd never disappoint a pretty face like yours.
[Flirt] Perish the thought.
You're cute. Not my kind of cute, but still--it's a shame.
You promised me a reward, right? Let's see it.
I always show up for credits.
Yeah... the thing is, there is no reward. Not for you, anyway.
This is harder than I thought it would be. You remind me of my sister, and I really like her.
It was sweet of you, flying all the way out here to save me. You seem like a nice guy.
Just so you know, this isn't personal. I have to kill you, but it's for love.
Nobody's ever tried to kill me for love before.
That's a new one.
It's romantic, right?
You're gonna make me shoot you, and then we'll both be sorry.
Don't do this.
Wait, you think I'm just standing here unprotected? Come on, I'm not stupid!
You're going to die.
I don't blame you for being angry. It makes things a little easier for me.
See this wavy light around my body? It's a ray shield. Blaster fire can't get in or out. Neat, huh?
If blaster fire can't get out, how'll you kill me?
Your plan is flawed.
Nice trick. See you around.
I'll be going now.
Sorry, I magnetically sealed all the hatches behind you.
That shield won't save you.
Not neat enough.
Shhh... quiet. I have to make a call....
Skavak! It's me, Feylara. Surprise!
Uh... long time no see, sweetheart. How'd you get this holofrequency?
Does it matter? I've missed you so much, honeybunch.
I missed you too... "honeybunch."
That makes two of us.
Don't tell me you used to date this crazy woman.
Is this your girl?
I'll kill you, Skavak.
What is this, Captain? You making an army out of my ex-girlfriends?
It's not like that at all. This is your nemesis, right? The captain who stole your ship on Coruscant and made you look stupid?
Heh, good times.
That's me, all right.
Why don't I leave you lovebirds alone?
I'll let you two talk.
Got a better idea--I'll leave. Can't think of a better punishment for you.
Say goodbye to your girl, Skavak.
You're a dead woman.
I'm trying to, believe me.
Don't be like that. You know you love me. You're just afraid of commitment.
I can prove how much I love you, honeybunch. I'm killing this nemesis for you.
Pretty lady has crazy eyes.
How come I have to die?
Get her, boys!
Get him, boys!
This is Captain Feylara Raed of free trader Celestial Crow. If anyone's out there, I need help!
I read you, Captain. What's the situation?
Ship's engines burned out. Power cells fading, losing life support. Can't hold out much longer--I'm drifting into a sun!
Need help getting my engines going. I'll pay if you help with repairs.
We girls need to stick together. I'm on my way, free of charge.
Save your credits.
You're a lifesaver!
I'm always ready to help a lady in distress.
[Flirt] I'm on my way.
Thanks. Haven't met many nice guys out here.
Music to my ears.
Don't have much, but it's all yours.
I am a mechanical genius....
What? You're breaking up. Life support just failed.
Transmitting my coordinates now. Please hurry....
